name: Defeated_Pantheon_1
logic: GG_Atrium + ((Defeated_Gruz_Mother + Defeated_False_Knight + *Boss_Geo-Massive_Moss_Charger/ + Defeated_Hornet_1 + Defeated_Gorb + Defeated_Dung_Defender + Defeated_Soul_Warrior + Defeated_Brooding_Mawlek) | (PANTHEON_KEY_1 ? FALSE) + COMBAT[Pantheon_1])

name: Defeated_Pantheon_2
logic: GG_Atrium + ((Defeated_Xero + Defeated_Crystal_Guardian + Defeated_Soul_Master + Defeated_Colosseum_2 + Defeated_Mantis_Lords + Defeated_Marmu + Defeated_Nosk + Defeated_Flukemarm + Defeated_Broken_Vessel) | (PANTHEON_KEY_2 ? FALSE) + COMBAT[Pantheon_2])

name: Defeated_Pantheon_3
logic: GG_Atrium + ((Defeated_Hive_Knight + Defeated_Elder_Hu + Defeated_Collector + Defeated_Colosseum_2 + Defeated_Grimm + Defeated_Galien + Defeated_Uumuu + Defeated_Hornet_2) | (PANTHEON_KEY_3 ? FALSE) + COMBAT[Pantheon_3])

name: Defeated_Pantheon_4
logic: GG_Atrium + Opened_Pantheon_4 + ((Defeated_Enraged_Guardian + Defeated_Broken_Vessel + Defeated_No_Eyes + Defeated_Traitor_Lord + Defeated_Dung_Defender + Defeated_False_Knight + Defeated_Markoth + Defeated_Watcher_Knights + Defeated_Soul_Master) | (PANTHEON_KEY_4 ? FALSE) + COMBAT[Pantheon_4])

name: Hit_Pantheon_5_Unlock_Orb
logic: GG_Atrium + WINGS + ANYCLAW + ((VOIDHEART + Defeated_Pantheon_1 + Defeated_Pantheon_2 + Defeated_Pantheon_3 + Defeated_Pantheon_4) | (PANTHEON_KEY_5 ? FALSE))

name: Defeated_Pantheon_5
logic: GG_Atrium_Roof + WINGS + ANYCLAW + ((Defeated_Pantheon_1 + Defeated_Pantheon_2 + Defeated_Pantheon_3 + Defeated_Pantheon_4 + COMBAT[Radiance]) | (PANTHEON_KEY_5 ? FALSE) + COMBAT[Pantheon_5])

name: Defeated_God_Tamer
logic: Room_Colosseum_01[left1] + Can_Replenish_Geo + (ANYCLAW | (SPICYCOMBATSKIPS + WINGS)) + COMBAT[Colosseum_3] + (READ ? TRUE) + (COLO_KEY_3 ? TRUE)

name: Radiant_Combat
logic: NAILCOMBAT + SPELLS>1 + (FULLSHADOWDASH | ANYSHADOWDASH + QUAKE + MILDCOMBATSKIPS) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS
